short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically unchecks the 'Follow <Company> to stay up to date with their page.' checkbox when using LinkedIn Easy Apply.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Saves you a click and maybe some scrolling by automatically unchecking the 'Follow <Company> to stay up to date with their page.' checkbox when using LinkedIn Easy Apply.
